    • Method Detail

      • findByName

        @GET
 @Path(value="/testsss")
 @UnitOfWork
public List<Employee> findByName(@QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                               com.google.common.base.Optional<String> name)
        Looks for employees whose first or last name contains the passed parameter as a substring. If name argument was not passed, returns all employees stored in the database.
        Parameters:
        name - query parameter
        Returns:
        list of employees whose first or last name contains the passed parameter as a substring or list of all employees stored in the database.

      • findById

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{id}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @UnitOfWork
public Employee findById(@PathParam(value="id")
                                                                                                          long id)
        Method looks for an employee by her id.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of an employee we are looking for.
        Returns:
        Optional containing the found employee or an empty Optional otherwise.
